dialogue: Uh, yeah. Judd?
Eyes forward! It’s for your own protection. So, tell me, Mike, how can I help you, Mike?
So, you're...
I am.
And you...
I do.
So, tell me what you're thinking. Unless you came here for the pancakes.
My wife.
What do you have in mind?
What do you think? This slut's killing me. I can't live just knowing she's out there... with someone else. So, now I'm here, with you.
So, why do you need me? Why aren't you taking care of this shit yourself?
Believe me, I want to, but we're going through a divorce right now and I'd be the number one suspect. So, I need the perfect front, the perfect alibi.
So, you're not technically divorced yet?
What's it to you? I forgot to mention, it might be a twofer. She's got this new boyfriend... a real douche.
...and?
And, if he's there, you can take him out too.
I've got no problem with that, but it's gonna cost you more. You good with it?
Yeah, fuck ‘em both.
Done. You bring the money?
Yeah, it's right here. This should be enough for both of them. I have a special request though.
I'm in the service business.
When you do it, I want her to know why. Right before you do it, look her in the eye and say "this is from your loving husband." I want that to be the last thing she fuckin' hears.
You know what? Maybe I'll throw in the boyfriend for free.
What the fuck?
What? It's very simple - you give me the money and I'll take care of it.
I'll take care of this shit myself...
